document_data.name: Barodal chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Barodal chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: They were based out of the capital city of [[Pyratar]] in northern [[Var]].
document_data.Activity: The Barodal chaka was involved in the grain and fishing industries.
